results.title: Mrs. Soffel
results.brief_description: A prison warden’s wife is seduced into helping a notorious killer escape.
results.description: A prison warden’s wife is seduced into helping a notorious killer escape.
description_for_label: A prison warden’s wife is seduced into helping a notorious killer escape.

results.title: Mrs. America
results.creator_credit: FX Productions, Bina Daigeler and Mara LePere-Schloop
results.brief_description: The true story of the movement to ratify the Equal Rights Amendment, and the unexpected backlash led by a conservative woman named Phyllis Schlafly, aka “the sweetheart of the silent majority.”

constellations_other.name: Wearing the pants, ladies who lead
constellations_other.description: The pre-code 1932 feature, A Bill of Divorcement, a glass cinema slide of which features in the glass cinema slide display, stars John Barrymore and Katharine Hepburn in her screen debut.

results.creator_credit_for_label: FX Productions, Bina Daigeler and Mara LePere-Schloop
results.description: The true story of the movement to ratify the Equal Rights Amendment, and the unexpected backlash led by a conservative woman named Phyllis Schlafly, aka “the sweetheart of the silent majority.”

results.title: Mr. Robot
results.brief_description: A young programmer, Elliot, suffers from a debilitating anti-social disorder and finds himself in the intersection between the cybersecurity firm he works for and the underworld organisations bringing down corporate America.

constellations_other.name: Hack the planet
constellations_other.description: How do you represent something that's... kinda boring to look at, like hacking, when you're operating in a visual medium like film, TV and videogames?

constellations_other.name: Fight for your right
constellations_other.description: Real world revolution and the fictional representations that reflect the struggle for equality in the past, present and dystopian future.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

constellations_other.name: Freedom from surveillance
constellations_other.description: Real world and cinematic authoritarianism and resistance explored through documentaries, Hollywood blockbusters, TV and videogames.

results.description: A contemporary and culturally resonant drama about a young programmer, Elliot, who suffers from a debilitating anti-social disorder and decides that he can only connect to people by hacking them. He wields his skills as a weapon to protect the people that he cares about. Elliot will find himself in the intersection between a cybersecurity firm he works for and the underworld organizations that are recruiting him to bring down corporate America.
description_for_label: A contemporary and culturally resonant drama about a young programmer, Elliot, who suffers from a debilitating anti-social disorder and decides that he can only connect to people by hacking them. He wields his skills as a weapon to protect the people that he cares about. Elliot will find himself in the intersection between a cybersecurity firm he works for and the underworld organizations that are recruiting him to bring down corporate America.

results.title: Mozart and the Whale
results.brief_description: A love story between two savants with Asperger’s syndrome, a kind of autism, whose conditions sabotage their budding relationship.
results.description: A love story between two savants with Asperger’s syndrome, a kind of autism, whose conditions sabotage their budding relationship.
description_for_label: A love story between two savants with Asperger’s syndrome, a kind of autism, whose conditions sabotage their budding relationship.

creators_other.name: Equity Pictures Medienfonds GmbH & Co. KG II

results.title: Moulin Rouge!
results.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 2001
results.brief_description: A celebration of love and creative inspiration takes place in the infamous, gaudy and glamorous Parisian nightclub, at the cusp of the 20th century. A young poet, who is plunged into the heady world of Moulin Rouge, begins a passionate affair with the club’s most notorious and beautiful star.

constellations_other.name: Raising the Roof: on-screen levity on rooftop
constellations_other.description: Performances soar to new heights on the rooftop, not only showcasing skylines but also creating electrifying drama, comedy and spectacle.

constellations_other.name: Jill Bilcock
constellations_other.description: An editor’s work often goes unnoticed, but they’re scene-stitching not only brings the director’s vision to life but sometimes steals the show. One of Australia’s greatest editors, Jill Bilcock, has shaped some of the country’s most memorable screen stories.

constellations_other.name: Oscar-winning transformations and prosthetics
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores how craft help actors undergo award-winning transformations into iconic characters.

results.description: A celebration of love and creative inspiration takes place in the infamous, gaudy and glamorous Parisian nightclub, at the cusp of the 20th century. A young poet, who is plunged into the heady world of Moulin Rouge, begins a passionate affair with the club’s most notorious and beautiful star.
description_for_label: A celebration of love and creative inspiration takes place in the infamous, gaudy and glamorous Parisian nightclub, at the cusp of the 20th century. A young poet, who is plunged into the heady world of Moulin Rouge, begins a passionate affair with the club’s most notorious and beautiful star.

results.title: Morocco
results.brief_description: The Foreign Legion marches into Mogador with booze and women in mind just as singer Amy Jolly arrives from Paris to work at Lo Tinto’s cabaret. That night, insouciant legionnaire Tom Brown catches her inimitably seductive, tuxedo-clad act.

constellations_other.name: Wearing the pants, ladies who lead
constellations_other.description: The pre-code 1932 feature, A Bill of Divorcement, a glass cinema slide of which features in the glass cinema slide display, stars John Barrymore and Katharine Hepburn in her screen debut.

results.description: The Foreign Legion marches in to Mogador with booze and women in mind just as singer Amy Jolly arrives from Paris to work at Lo Tinto’s cabaret. That night, insouciant legionnaire Tom Brown catches her inimitably seductive, tuxedo-clad act. Both bruised by their past lives, the two edge cautiously into a no-strings relationship while being pursued by others. But Tom must leave on a perilous mission: is it too late for them?
description_for_label: The Foreign Legion marches in to Mogador with booze and women in mind just as singer Amy Jolly arrives from Paris to work at Lo Tinto’s cabaret. That night, insouciant legionnaire Tom Brown catches her inimitably seductive, tuxedo-clad act. Both bruised by their past lives, the two edge cautiously into a no-strings relationship while being pursued by others. But Tom must leave on a perilous mission: is it too late for them?

results.title: Mork & Mindy
results.creator_credit: Henderson Productions, Miller-Milkis Productions, Paramount Television, Brian Levant, Garry Marshall, Anthony W. Marshall, Dale McRaven and Bruce Johnson
results.brief_description: Mork & Mindy is an American science fiction sitcom broadcast from 1978 until 1982. The series starred Robin Williams as Mork, an alien who comes to Earth from the planet Ork in a small, one-man egg-shaped spaceship.

constellations_other.name: Princesses, rom-coms and sit-coms
constellations_other.description: Newsreel footage was captured on large, bulky 35mm cameras like the Mitchell Newsreel Camera by operators in the field, but they were also used by film production companies and on TV shows, with some of those involved going on to define different genres.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Henderson Productions, Miller-Milkis Productions, Paramount Television, Brian Levant, Garry Marshall, Anthony W. Marshall, Dale McRaven and Bruce Johnson
results.description: Mork & Mindy is an American science fiction sitcom broadcast from 1978 until 1982 on ABC. The series starred Robin Williams as Mork, an alien who comes to Earth from the planet Ork in a small, one-man egg-shaped spaceship. Pam Dawber co-starred as Mindy McConnell, his human friend and roommate. In 1997, the episode “Mork’s Mixed Emotions” was ranked #94 on TV Guide’s 100 Greatest Episodes of All Time list.
description_for_label: Mork & Mindy is an American science fiction sitcom broadcast from 1978 until 1982 on ABC. The series starred Robin Williams as Mork, an alien who comes to Earth from the planet Ork in a small, one-man egg-shaped spaceship. Pam Dawber co-starred as Mindy McConnell, his human friend and roommate. In 1997, the episode “Mork’s Mixed Emotions” was ranked #94 on TV Guide’s 100 Greatest Episodes of All Time list.

results.title: Moonstruck
results.brief_description: No sooner does Italian American widow Loretta accept a marriage proposal from her doltish boyfriend, Johnny, than she finds herself falling for his younger brother, Ronny.

constellations_other.name: Culture, food and family
constellations_other.description: Food as a link to culture and family.

results.description: No sooner does Italian-American widow Loretta accept a marriage proposal from her doltish boyfriend, Johnny, than she finds herself falling for his younger brother, Ronny. She tries to resist, but Ronny lost his hand in an accident he blames on his brother, and has no scruples about aggressively pursuing her while Johnny is out of the country. As Loretta falls deeper in love, she comes to learn that she’s not the only one in her family with a secret romance.
description_for_label: No sooner does Italian-American widow Loretta accept a marriage proposal from her doltish boyfriend, Johnny, than she finds herself falling for his younger brother, Ronny. She tries to resist, but Ronny lost his hand in an accident he blames on his brother, and has no scruples about aggressively pursuing her while Johnny is out of the country. As Loretta falls deeper in love, she comes to learn that she’s not the only one in her family with a secret romance.

results.title: Moonlight
results.brief_description: The tender, heartbreaking story of a young man’s struggle to find himself, told across three defining chapters in his life as he experiences the ecstasy, pain, and beauty of falling in love, while grappling with his own sexuality.

constellations_other.name: Place, portraiture, performance
constellations_other.description: The nature of the collaboration between David Gulpilil and Rolf De Heer on Ten Canoes connects the film to their other collaborations, and a number of other works as well.

results.description: The tender, heartbreaking story of a young man’s struggle to find himself, told across three defining chapters in his life as he experiences the ecstasy, pain, and beauty of falling in love, while grappling with his own sexuality.
description_for_label: The tender, heartbreaking story of a young man’s struggle to find himself, told across three defining chapters in his life as he experiences the ecstasy, pain, and beauty of falling in love, while grappling with his own sexuality.

results.title: Moon
results.brief_description: Sam Bell is getting anxious to finally return to Earth. He is the only occupant of a Moon-based manufacturing facility along with his computer and assistant, GERTY. When he has an accident however, he wakens to find that he is not alone.

constellations_other.name: Blizzard, Bowie and the Bonets
constellations_other.description: Overwatch is the beginning of some surprising connections in this Constellation that explores videogame movies, cartoons, and music docos and shows.

results.description: With only three weeks left in his three year contract, Sam Bell is getting anxious to finally return to Earth. He is the only occupant of a Moon-based manufacturing facility along with his computer and assistant, GERTY. When he has an accident however, he wakens to find that he is not alone.
description_for_label: With only three weeks left in his three year contract, Sam Bell is getting anxious to finally return to Earth. He is the only occupant of a Moon-based manufacturing facility along with his computer and assistant, GERTY. When he has an accident however, he wakens to find that he is not alone.
